ballet shoes.desc: These used shoes make you feel incredibly dangerous

bandage.desc: It has already been used several times

hot dog.desc: The 'meat' is made of something called a 'water sausage.'

tem flakes.desc: it's just torn up pieces of colored construction paper.

hot cat.desc: Like a hot dog. but a little cat ears on the end.

bisicle.desc: it's a two-proned popsicle. so you can eat it twice

burnt pan.desc: Damage is rather consistent, consumable items heal four more HP

cinnamon bunny.desc: A cinnamon roll in the shape of a bunny.

cloudy glasses.desc: Glasses marred with wear. Increases INV by 6.

cowboy hat.desc: This battle-worn hat makes you want to grow a beard. It also raises  ATTACK by 5.

crab apple.desc: An aquatic fruit that resembles a cristacean.

empty gun.desc: An antique revolver. It has no ammo, Must be used precisely or damage will be low.

faded ribbon.desc: If you're cuter, monster won't hit you as hard.

glamburger.desc: A hamburger made of edible glitter and sequins.

hush puppy.desc: This Wonderful spell will stop a dog from casting magic

junk food.desc: Food that was probably once thrown away.

legendary hero.desc: Sandwich shaped like a sword. Increases ATTACK when eaten.

manly bandanna.desc: It has seen some wear, it has abs drawn on it.

nice cream.desc: Instead of a joke, the wrapper says something nice.

old tutu.desc: Finally, a protective piece of armor

sea tea.desc: Made from a glowing marsh water, increases SPEED for one battle.

spider cider.desc: Made with whole spiders, not just the juice.

spider donut.desc: A donut made with Spider Cider in the batter.

starfait.desc: A sweet treat made of sparkling stars.

steak in the shape of mettaton's face.desc: Huge streak in the shape of Mettaton's face, you dont feel like its made of real meat.

stick.desc: Its bark is worse than its bite.

temmie armor.desc:
The things you can do with college educational Raises ATTACk when worn.
Recovers HP every other turn. INV up slightly.

torn notebook.desc: Contains illegable scrawls, Increases INV by 6

tough gloves.desc: A worn pink leather glove, For five-fingered folk.

toy knife.desc: Made of plastic, A rarity nowadays.

worn dagger.desc: Perfect for cutting plants and vines.
